ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors thank the clinical investigators, patients, and site personnel who participated in this study. Editorial and medical writing assistance was provided by Jennifer Vanden Burgt, an independent Medical Affairs consultant, Minneapolis, MN and funded by Helsinn Healthcare SA, Lugano, Switzerland.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: Helsinn Healthcare, SA, Lugano, Switzerland who provided the study drugs and the funding for this study (no grant number applies).

sec.title: Disclosure

All remaining authors have declared no conflicts of interest.
